Recreation




Sports at IGEN


Sports at IGEN

Click the button below for the website where the UBC rec leagues ( dates and times for each sport offered) and some events that IGEN is looking to be involved with. If you are interested in playing or participating in any of the following please contact Tanya Bennet, the IGEN Sports Representative. Please include your name, student number and sports/events you are interested in. If you have any other questions regarding recreation at IGEN, feel free to contact her.

Contact person

Tanya Bennet
Sports Rep

bennet.ubc@gmail.com or through facebook
